subject: Basketball
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: A four-month standoff between N.B.A. players and owners has been reduced to a four-day window, with an ultimatum that might cancel the 2011-12 season.
snippet: A four-month standoff between N.B.A. players and owners has been reduced to a four-day window, with an ultimatum that might cancel the 2011-12 season.
